request_too_large.description: The size of the request exceeds the server configured limit

unexpected_error.description: Caught an unexpected HTTP parsing error

too_many_encodings.description: The number of encodings exceeds the server configured limit

unsupported_compression.description: The request has been compressed using an unsupported compression algorithm

compression_disabled.description: The server has been configured to refuse compressed requests

unsupported_verb.description: An HTTP request has been submitted using an unsupported verb

unsupported_content.description: The content described in the content-type header is not supported

duplicate_url.description: Triggered when an attempt is made to register a duplicate URL in the HTTP router
duplicate_url.message: Unable to attach URL %s: this path already exists.

volatile_parse_failed.description: The x-kuzzle-volatile header received is not in JSON format
volatile_parse_failed.message: Unable to convert the "x-kuzzle-volatile" HTTP header to JSON: %s

body_parse_failed.description: The request body is not in JSON format
body_parse_failed.message: Unable to convert the HTTP body to JSON: %s

file_too_large.description: The submitted file exceeds the server configured limit

ratelimit_exceeded.description: Too many requests received from a client socket
ratelimit_exceeded.message: Rejected: too many requests received from that socket

shutting_down.description: Request rejected because this instance is shutting down
